bill.title: Public Utilities Commission; Electric Utility Rates
bill.description: Requires the Public Utilities Commission, in exercising its authority and duties, to consider the costs and benefits of a diverse fossil fuel portfolio and of maximizing the efficiency of all electric utility assets to lower and stabilize the cost of electricity, without subverting the electric utilities' obligation to meet renewable portfolio standards. (SD2)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to EEP, referral sheet 1
Carried over to 2012 Regular Session.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 01-31-12 8:15AM in conference room 325.

(H) The committee recommends that the measure pass with amendments, for recommittal for further consideration. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Coffman, Kawakami, Chang, Nakashima, Riviere, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 5 Excused: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Carroll, Har, Herkes, Ito.
(H) Re-referred to EEP, CPC, FIN, referral sheet 11
(H) Reported from EEP (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 35-12) as amended in HD 1.
(H) Recommends recommittal to EEP
(H) HD 1 adopted and recommitted to EEP for further consideration with none voting no and Representative(s) Okamura, Say excused.
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by EEP on Tuesday, 02-07-12 9:00AM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on EEP recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Coffman, Kawakami, Carroll, Chang, Har, Herkes, Ito, Riviere; Ayes with reservations: none; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Thielen; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Nakashima.
(H) Reported from EEP (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 214-12) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.

(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 2 and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with Representative(s) Wooley voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Ching, Hanohano, Pine, Takai, Thielen, Ward voting no (6) and Representative(s) Belatti, C. Lee, M. Lee, Souki excused (4).
(H) Re-referred to EEP, CPC, referral sheet 29
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Monday, 02-27-12 2:05PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Brower, Cabanilla, Ito, Souki, Tsuji, Marumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Thielen; and 7 Excused: Representative(s) Herkes, Carroll, Coffman, Keith-Agaran, Luke, McKelvey, Ching.
(H) Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 713-12) as amended in HD 3, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-06-12.

(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 3 with Representative(s) Pine voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Ching, Hanohano, Thielen voting no (3) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 41).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to ENE, CPN.
(S) The committee(s) on ENE has scheduled a public hearing on 03-15-12 3:00PM in conference room 225.

(S) The committee(s) on ENE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in ENE were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Gabbard, English, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Green, Slom.
(S) Reported from ENE (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2949) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to CPN.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to CPN.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN will hold a public decision making on 03-30-12 9:30AM in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Taniguchi, Nishihara; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Galuteria, Green, Solomon.
(S) Reported from CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3169) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 04-10-12.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.

(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).

(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Gabbard, Chair; Baker, Co-Chair(s); Ihara.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 753).
(H) Reconsideration of action taken on 4-12-12
(S) Received notice of House reconsideration of action in disagreeing to the amendments proposed by the Senate (Hse. Com. No. 616).
(H) House agrees to Senate amendment(s).
(H) Passed Final Reading as amended in SD 2 with Representative(s) Ching, Pine, Thielen, Ward voting no (4) and Representative(s) Chang, Souki excused (2).
(H) Transmitted to Governor.
(S) Received notice of House agreement and passage on Final Reading (Hse. Com. No. 625).
